name: Dungeon Warrior 3
description:
DUNGEON WARRIOR 3 DUNGEON WARRIOR 3 DUNGEON WARRIOR 3 DUNGEON WARRIOR 3

A princess has been kidnapped by Orcs, Help a young boy discover his special gift, A queen needs your help to prevent a demon from coming to the  world. An orc needs your help to restore peace to the Orc Kingdom, A prince needs your help wake a princess from a sleeping spell, And two twin sisters need you to save the world.

Create a party of four and journey through a massive world where you sail to different kingdoms and help a person there to save it or rescue somebody. Choose from a variety of classes including Warrior, Cleric, Wizard, Thief. And new classes like Bard Viking and Shaman. Learn Cleric spells by visiting Churchs, Buy magic spell books for wizards and challenge Spirits to gain Shaman Spirits.

Inspired by the 16-bit era Dungeon Warrior 3 is a tribute to the sega genesis/Super Nintendo era and it plays like a 16-bit game. But be warned you have over 100 enemies to battle, A massive world to explore and find new treasures and solve puzzles.

Features:

7 hours of gameplay

Different classes to choose from

A fifth party member that acts on their own

Over 50 different locations to explore

Create your own party

Fun and Humor scenes in the game
